sense.def: Pathological Condition of huang dan 黃疸 , yellow dan -illness, accompanied by psychiatric illness signs such as heart-pressure, hectic panting, an excessive talkativeness and laughing, restlessness, and absent-mindedness. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 Substance Entry a bo le 阿勃勒：心膈間熱 風，心黃 , “[It cures] heat wind in the region of heart and diaphragm, as well as heart jaundice ”.
